description: Fotodiox Octagon Flash Softbox softens the light coming from your external flash providing an even diffusion of light while staying out of the way of your lens.  The Octagon Softbox is helpful to on-the-go photographers.  Our Softbox fits dozens of flash units, including Nikon and Canon. The Softbox uses permanently attached Velcro strips to connect to the flash.  The grip surfaces keep the Softbox from slipping off, even during an active shoot. The Softboxes feature a premium reflective surface inside with a removable inner diffusion panel to help control how soft you want the light.
title: Fotodiox 8" Octagon Softbox for Nikon Flash, Canon Speedlight, for Nikon SB-600, SB-700, SB-800, SB-900, SB-910 Flash, Canon Speedlite 380EX, 430EX, 430EX II, 550EX, 580EX, 580EX II, 600EX-RT, Vivitar Flash, Sunpack, Sunpak, Nissin, Sigma, Sony, Pentax, Olympus, Panasonic Lumix Flashes
